cells.data: To create a snippet, go to the **Snippet** notebook and create a note. All cells that are designated as **code** and **handlebars** will be combined together to make the template. All cells that are designated as **code** and **json** will be combined with the **Defaults** data to make the database that **Handlebars** will use to fill in the macro expansions.
All other cell type are ignored. But, you can use them to add notes, explanations, or diagrams for the data and templates.
